description: Located in the historic centre of an attractive village by the lake, this restaurant is a good option for anyone wanting to try Umbrian cuisine. Dishes made from freshwater fish (pike, carp, tench, eel and crayfish), as well as the famous beans from Lake Trasimeno and meat such as lamb and wild boar, take pride of place on the menu.
